spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout preservation. Room adjacency and door swings are highly accurate. Minor scale distortion in the kitchen depth and bedroom closet area.

structural_fidelity.notes: Roof correctly removed with all walls visible. Flat-base floating model achieved. Deducted points for slight artifacts in the door frame geometry.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture matches the diagram accurately (sofa, dining set, bed, kitchen appliances). Block-style aesthetic is consistent.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect adherence to style constraints: floating isometric orthographic view, no textures, flat colors, and neutral background.

detected_errors.description: Minor scaling distortion in the kitchen area; the distance between the sink counter and stove wall appears slightly elongated compared to the 2D plan.
Structural reinterpretation of the bedroom closet: the built-in wardrobe is rendered with vertical slats/lines not explicitly detailed in the original footprint.
